attributes.action: incorporate the following changes into any reform of the Upper Chamber of Parliament:-
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that the following be incorported into any reform of the Parliamentary system currently being considered:-

Abolition of the titles given to members of the House of Lords.  That newly appointed members to the Upper Chamber no longer be given a title ie:  Lord; Baroness; Lady etc.  Peers ought to be on a par with the rest of society, not labelled in old fashioned terms which lend themselves to snobbery.  Hopefully this would also ensure that individuals with real skills and sense of service would come forward to serve rather than those seeking an ‘honour’.

An end to ‘automatic’ transfer into the Upper Chamber by certain former MPs.  Each application to be fully considered on merit, not as a ‘grace and favour’ appointment.
